yeah ... yeah...

but right when did he die? was it when the gantry collapsed at the mosaic? or when he saw her go by in the funeral boat was that just a premonition of what would happen after the dwarf got him?

and what the fuck was the dwarf about?

WARN HIM! FETCH HIM BACK! WARN HIM!

I've seen it like ten times, i love it, i understand the themes, and i'm fine with surrealism and non-linear narratives, but i still can't decide what actually happened in that film.

He died when the dwarf got him, I would have said. The funeral boat thing was a premonition.

That's always been my take.

But really...he died when the young wan died.

In his heart.

Sob.
